DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire Today Or Past Month Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand Experience Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's description of a feeling of weakness in their arm or hand today or in the past month, using a text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire Today Or Past Month Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand Experience
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer._The day that includes the present moment, as distinct from yesterday or tomorrow._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Before the present time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks_A question about whether an individual has or had weakness in their arm or hand._The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

Concepts.definition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

Property.preferredName: Today Or Past Month Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand Experience
Property.preferredDefinition: The day that includes the present moment, as distinct from yesterday or tomorrow.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Past; before the present time.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A question about whether an individual has or had weakness in their arm or hand.:The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

Concepts.definition: The day that includes the present moment, as distinct from yesterday or tomorrow.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.longName: Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had weakness in their arm or hand.
The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools
